content.raw:
This should be a rather straightforward implementation. 

Steffi just change the color of `colorhex` in the `isHovered` code part in the function `UpdateStyleSheet()` to test new colors.

Also this PR proves that I am proficient with Qt Drag and Drop implementation, the most essential part of the GSoC plugins project, and should serve as a strong support for my application.

Looking forward to comments on code :)

Thanks.
content.html:
This should be a rather straightforward implementation.

Steffi just change the color of colorhex in the isHovered code part in the function UpdateStyleSheet() to test new colors.

Also this PR proves that I am proficient with Qt Drag and Drop implementation, the most essential part of the GSoC plugins project, and should serve as a strong support for my application.

Looking forward to comments on code :)

Thanks.
